question: Taj-ud-din Firoz Shah was defeated by which of the following kings of the Vijayanagar kingdom?
explanation: Taj-ud-din Firoz Shah (1397â€“1422 CE ) invaded the Vijaynagar empire with victories in c.1398 CE and c.1408 CE. He again invaded the Vijayanagar kingdom in 1420 CE and faced a defeat at the hands of Deva Raya I.
